  # eth_chainId



  Returns the chain ID of the current network.

  ## Parameters (by position)

  This method does not accept any parameters.

  ## Result

  **Chain ID** `string`

  hex encoded unsigned integer

  *Match pattern:* `^0x(0|[1-9a-f][0-9a-f]*)$`

  ***

  ## Examples

  <div>
    <details>
      <summary>
        eth_chainId example
      </summary>

      #### Request

      ```json
      {
        "params": []
      }
      ```

      #### Response

      ```json
      "0x1"
      ```
